CHANGE_USERNAME_ERROR: Sorry, your username could not be changed.
PROFILE_CURRENT_PASSWORD_INCORRECT: Check your password and try again
PROFILE_CURRENT_PASSWORD_PROMPT: Confirm the password for your account
RESEND_VERIFICATION_EMAIL_ERROR: Sorry, we couldn't resend the verification email.
RESEND_VERIFICATION_EMAIL_SUCCESS: Check your mailbox for the verification code. You may have to check your spam folder.
VERIFY_EMAIL_ERROR: Sorry, we couldn't verify your email.
VERIFY_EMAIL_EXPLANATION: Check your email for a code that we sent you. If you can't find it, try checking your spam folder, and if that doesn't work, try resending a verification email.
VERIFY_EMAIL_INVALID:
Your verification code is incorrect, or the verification code has expired.

If it's been more than a day since you received the verification email, you'll need to resend the verification email to get a new code.
VERIFY_EMAIL_SUCCESS: Your email has been verified. Thank you!
